```{r}
library('readr')
```

### 3715 Untrimmed SPAdes (Old)
```{r}
# Load in .tsv files
untrim.3715.55 <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.55.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.75 <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.75.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.95 <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.95.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.111 <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.111.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.127 <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.127.output.tsv')

untrim.3715.55.sq <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.55.sq.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.75.sq <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.75.sq.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.95.sq <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.95.sq.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.111.sq <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.111.sq.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.127.sq <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.127.sq.output.tsv')

# Calculate unclassified vs. classified
untrim.3715.prop <- data.frame(matrix(5,5))
untrim.3715.prop$Kmer <- c(55,75,95,111,127)
untrim.3715.prop$Unclassified <- c(
  length(which(untrim.3715.55$seqID =="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.55),
  length(which(untrim.3715.55$seqID =="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.55),
  length(which(untrim.3715.95$seqID =="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.95),
  length(which(untrim.3715.111$seqID =="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.111),
  length(which(untrim.3715.127$seqID =="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.127)
)
untrim.3715.prop <- untrim.3715.prop[,-1]
untrim.3715.prop$Bact.Arch <- c(
  length(which(untrim.3715.55$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.55),
  length(which(untrim.3715.55$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.55),
  length(which(untrim.3715.95$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.95),
  length(which(untrim.3715.111$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.111),
  length(which(untrim.3715.127$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.127)
)
untrim.3715.prop$Squirrel <- c(
  length(which(untrim.3715.55.sq$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.55.sq),
  length(which(untrim.3715.55.sq$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.55.sq),
  length(which(untrim.3715.95.sq$seqID != "unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.95.sq),
  length(which(untrim.3715.111.sq$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.111.sq),
  length(which(untrim.3715.127.sq$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.127.sq)
)
untrim.3715.prop$Unclassified <- 1 - untrim.3715.prop$Bact.Arch - untrim.3715.prop$Squirrel

# Number of classified bact/arch
untrim.3715.55.report <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.55.report.tsv')
untrim.3715.75.report <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.75.report.tsv')
untrim.3715.95.report <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.95.report.tsv')
untrim.3715.111.report <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.111.report.tsv')
untrim.3715.127.report <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/old/3715.untrimmed.127.report.tsv')

untrim.3715.55.abund <- untrim.3715.55.report[which(untrim.3715.55.report$abundance>0),]
untrim.3715.75.abund <- untrim.3715.55.report[which(untrim.3715.75.report$abundance>0),]
untrim.3715.95.abund <- untrim.3715.55.report[which(untrim.3715.95.report$abundance>0),]
untrim.3715.111.abund <- untrim.3715.55.report[which(untrim.3715.111.report$abundance>0),]
untrim.3715.127.abund <- untrim.3715.55.report[which(untrim.3715.127.report$abundance>0),]

untrim.3715.prop$Num.Species <- c(nrow(untrim.3715.55.abund),nrow(untrim.3715.75.abund),
                                nrow(untrim.3715.95.abund),nrow(untrim.3715.111.abund),
                                nrow(untrim.3715.127.abund))

# Quast N50
untrim.3715.prop$N50 <- c(2505,2959,3296,3545,4801)
untrim.3715.prop$Contigs <- c(111864,108790,105754,103161,91748)      
untrim.3715.prop$Largest.Contig <- c(115865,207778,399291,518071,1334334)
```

### 3715 Untrimmed SPAdes
```{r}
# Load in .tsv files
untrim.3715.55 <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/3715.spades.untrim.55.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.75 <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/3715.spades.untrim.75.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.95 <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/3715.spades.untrim.95.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.111 <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/3715.spades.untrim.111.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.127 <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/3715.spades.untrim.127.output.tsv')

# Calculate unclassified vs. classified
untrim.3715.prop <- data.frame(matrix(5,5))
untrim.3715.prop$Kmer <- c(55,75,95,111,127)
untrim.3715.prop$Unclassified <- c(
  length(which(untrim.3715.55$taxID=="0"))/nrow(untrim.3715.55),
  length(which(untrim.3715.75$taxID=="0"))/nrow(untrim.3715.75),
  length(which(untrim.3715.95$taxID=="0"))/nrow(untrim.3715.95),
  length(which(untrim.3715.111$taxID=="0"))/nrow(untrim.3715.111),
  length(which(untrim.3715.127$taxID=="0"))/nrow(untrim.3715.127)
)
untrim.3715.prop <- untrim.3715.prop[,-1]
untrim.3715.prop$Microbial <- c(
  length(which(untrim.3715.55$taxID != "0" &
                 untrim.3715.55$taxID != "43179"))/nrow(untrim.3715.55),
  length(which(untrim.3715.75$taxID != "0" &
                 untrim.3715.75$taxID != "43179"))/nrow(untrim.3715.75),
  length(which(untrim.3715.95$taxID != "0" &
                 untrim.3715.95$taxID != "43179"))/nrow(untrim.3715.95),
  length(which(untrim.3715.111$taxID != "0" &
                 untrim.3715.111$taxID != "43179"))/nrow(untrim.3715.111),
  length(which(untrim.3715.127$taxID != "0" &
                 untrim.3715.127$taxID != "43179"))/nrow(untrim.3715.127)
)
untrim.3715.prop$Squirrel <- c(
  length(which(untrim.3715.55$taxID == "43179"))/nrow(untrim.3715.55),
  length(which(untrim.3715.75$taxID == "43179"))/nrow(untrim.3715.75),
  length(which(untrim.3715.95$taxID == "43179"))/nrow(untrim.3715.95),
  length(which(untrim.3715.111$taxID == "43179"))/nrow(untrim.3715.111),
  length(which(untrim.3715.127$taxID == "43179"))/nrow(untrim.3715.127)
)

# Number of classified Microbes
untrim.3715.55.report <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/3715.spades.untrim.55.report.tsv')
untrim.3715.75.report <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/3715.spades.untrim.75.report.tsv')
untrim.3715.95.report <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/3715.spades.untrim.95.report.tsv')
untrim.3715.111.report <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/3715.spades.untrim.111.report.tsv')
untrim.3715.127.report <- read_tsv('3715.untrim/3715.spades.untrim.127.report.tsv')

untrim.3715.55.abund <- untrim.3715.55.report[which(untrim.3715.55.report$abundance>0),]
untrim.3715.75.abund <- untrim.3715.55.report[which(untrim.3715.75.report$abundance>0),]
untrim.3715.95.abund <- untrim.3715.55.report[which(untrim.3715.95.report$abundance>0),]
untrim.3715.111.abund <- untrim.3715.55.report[which(untrim.3715.111.report$abundance>0),]
untrim.3715.127.abund <- untrim.3715.55.report[which(untrim.3715.127.report$abundance>0),]

untrim.3715.prop$Num.Species <- c(nrow(untrim.3715.55.abund), nrow(untrim.3715.75.abund),
                                nrow(untrim.3715.95.abund), nrow(untrim.3715.111.abund),
                                nrow(untrim.3715.127.abund))

# Quast Stats
untrim.3715.prop$N50 <- c(2505,2959,3296,3545,4801)
untrim.3715.prop$Contigs <- c(111864,108790,105754,103161,91748)      
untrim.3715.prop$Largest.Contig <- c(115865,207778,399291,518071,1334334)
```

### 3715 Megahit
```{r}
# Load in .tsv files
untrim.3715.mega <- read_tsv('3715.megahit/3715.untrim.mega.output.tsv')
untrim.3715.mega.sq <- read_tsv('3715.megahit/3715.untrim.mega.sq.output.tsv')
trim.3715.mega <- read_tsv('3715.megahit/3715.trim.mega.output.tsv')
trim.3715.mega.sq <- read_tsv('3715.megahit/3715.trim.mega.sq.output.tsv')

# Calculate unclassified vs. classified
mega.3715.prop <- data.frame(matrix(2,2))
mega.3715.prop$Data <- c("Trimmed", "Untrimmed")
mega.3715.prop$Unclassified <- c(
  length(which(trim.3715.mega$seqID == "unclassified"))/nrow(trim.3715.mega),
  length(which(untrim.3715.mega$seqID =="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.mega))
mega.3715.prop$Bact.Arch <- c(
  length(which(trim.3715.mega$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(trim.3715.mega),
  length(which(untrim.3715.mega$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.mega))
mega.3715.prop$Squirrel <- c(
  length(which(trim.3715.mega.sq$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(trim.3715.mega.sq),
  length(which(untrim.3715.mega.sq$seqID !="unclassified"))/nrow(untrim.3715.mega.sq))
mega.3715.prop$Unclassified <- 1 - mega.3715.prop$Bact.Arch - mega.3715.prop$Squirrel
mega.3715.prop <- mega.3715.prop[,-1]

# Number of classified bact/arch
mega.3715.trim.report <- read_tsv('3715.megahit/3715.trim.mega.report.tsv')
mega.3715.untrim.report <- read_tsv('3715.megahit/3715.untrim.mega.report.tsv')

mega.3715.trim.abund <- 
  mega.3715.trim.report[which(mega.3715.trim.report$abundance>0),]
mega.3715.untrim.abund <-
  mega.3715.trim.report[which(mega.3715.untrim.report$abundance>0),]

mega.3715.prop$Num.Species <- c(nrow(mega.3715.trim.abund), nrow(mega.3715.untrim.abund))

# Quast N50
mega.3715.prop$N50 <- c(3071, 3079)
mega.3715.prop$Contigs <- c(103691,104554)
mega.3715.prop$Largest.Contig <- c(498993,498993)
```
